title: Brie Larson’s Captain Marvel First Look - The Kinda Funny Morning Show 01.25.18
description:
Thanks to Me Undies for sponsoring this episode. Go to https://MeUndies.com/Morning and get 20% off a matching pair of MeUndies for you and your partner

Andy and Nick discuss Brie Larson’s Captain Marvel costume, Mission: Impossible 6's official title, Crocodile Dundee can suck it, and 50 Cent gets richer.

-Mission Impossible Fallout (13:30 mins)
-Heres the truth behind that fake Danny Mcbride dundee movie (16:25 mins)
-Rian Johnson considered every option before choosing Reys parents for The Last Jedi (21:40 mins)
-50 Cent accidently made $8 million in bitcoin (24:50 mins)
-Bill & Ted 3 writer says movie struggling to secure funding (32:33 mins)
-First look at Brie Larson as captain marvel (43:00 mins)

Thanks to http://twitter.com/kumailh for our timestamps!

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Tim Gettys, and Nick Scarpino talk about the biggest stories in nerd culture.
